: : Lunekill : :

As Lunekill was about to take off, she recieves the telepathic message from Unicron.

Lunekill: Brother, I will set up a jamming field to block all transmissions. As we systematicaly destroy the factions on this planet, we search for the Matrix. I believe the Maximals would be the most likely to know of its whereabouts.

Lunekill changes to her orbiting station mode(OOC: Thing of a smaller scale version of Deep Space Nine), and then launches six probes into orbit, which set up the jamming field.

Lunekill then slowy moves towards the Maximal base.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
Rockseeker: Ready when you are, I said. These two will have their 
time when we get to them. Let's stick to our plan.

He transformed to meteor and was ready to go.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Lunekill : :
> 
> The powerful femmebot looks to her brother.
>

> 
>

<DIV><STRONG>: : Lunekill : :</STRONG></DIV>
<P>As Lunekill was about to take off, she recieves the telepathic message from Unicron.</P>
<P><STRONG>Lunekill: </STRONG>Brother, I will set up a jamming field to block all transmissions. As we systematicaly destroy the factions on this planet, we search for the Matrix. I believe the Maximals would be the most likely to know of its whereabouts.</P>
<P>Lunekill changes to her orbiting station mode(<STRONG>OOC: </STRONG>Thing of a smaller scale version of Deep Space Nine), and then launches six probes into orbit, which set up the jamming field.</P>
<P>Lunekill then slowy moves towards the Maximal base.</P>
